title: Quick Wins - ESLint Cleanup
description: Fix 15-20 low-hanging ESLint errors: nested ternaries, dead stores, unused variables, and require-await violations
implementation: Extract nested ternaries to if/else blocks (follow harden.ts:396 pattern)
Remove dead stores and unused variables
Fix require-await violations (remove async or add await)
Run tests after each batch of 3-5 fixes
Update progress checkpoint with final count
acceptanceCriteria: All nested ternary errors eliminated (9 errors)
All dead store/unused variable errors fixed
